mapper.select: select i.imgpath from tbl_puser p, tbl_userimg i where p.userid=i.userid and p.userid=#{userid}
select c.content, m.* from tbl_type_category c, tbl_mytype m where m.typeid=c.typeid and m.userid=#{userid}
select c.content, h.* from tbl_type_category c, tbl_userhobby h where h.hobbyid=c.typeid and h.userid=#{userid};
select c.content, l.* from tbl_type_category c, tbl_liketype l where l.typeid=c.typeid and l.userid=#{userid}
select count(*) from tbl_puser where userid=#{userid}
select count(*) from tbl_puser where usernickname=#{usernickname}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_puser(userid, userpassword, userage, username, usernickname, gendercode, regdate, localcode, loginstatus,userdelete) values(#{userid}, #{userpassword}, #{userage}, #{username}, #{usernickname}, #{gendercode}, now(), #{localcode}, true,0);
insert into tbl_userimg(userid, imgpath, imgshow) values(#{userid}, #{imgpath}, #{imgshow});
insert into tbl_userinfo(userid, userheight, userjob, usercomment) values(#{userid}, #{userheight}, #{userjob}, #{usercomment})
